name: Explosive Dice (Aramilion)
description:
Exploding dice 

  • BUY different dice with coins to power your dice throwing engine
  • THROW dice and harness their power not once, but EACH time they stop
  • PROFIT and repeat. Conquer the online leaderboards

It's a luck based game where you buy different colored dice, each one having various effects that are activated whenever the dice stop moving.

Setup combos with chain reactions that let you score one dice multiple times in a round!

With the cost of throwing increasing each round, show your friends and the world how much points can you get before running out of money on the ONLINE leaderboards!

This game is a submition for GMTK Game Jam 2022, done in a weekend by Dawid Noras
Thanks to Joanna Noras, my lovely wife, who helped me with testing, balancing and searching for arts online, and let me spend whole weekend in my room working on this project <3

Leaderboards powered by Playfab
